title: Why is dhur & Asr silent? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: travis says why is the and asir silent why not see we are not given the justification that fajr margherita and isha the first two raqqas are loud because of this and that and the third raka of maghrib or the third and fourth of uh uh the third and fourth of asia are silent because this and that we don't have any justification so it is something that is entirely a form of worship of allah allah tells you sit down you said allah tells you to stand up you stand up you don't get the chance to ask why because this is an instruction of allah so we pray it as we pray it because allah ordered that ordered us to do so and allah's best
